page.description: Specify the title for the popup-window.

section.description: This property only appears when the '[Show UX Component validation errors in popup-window]' property is checked. The popup-window will only work with validation and error reports that happen on the component level. This can be done using the [dialogValidate] event in the [Server-side] events page in the 'Events' section of the UX Builder's main menu.
